modName: Revert Fortify Restoration Fix of the Unofficial Skyrim Patch
summary: Reverts the changes of the Unofficial Skyrim Patch, so that Fortify Restoration potions boost enchantments and magic effects on the player again.
descriptionHtml:
Reverts the changes of the Unofficial Skyrim Patch, so that Fortify Restoration potions boost enchantments and magic effects on the player again.

I always thought this fix in version 1.3.0 of the USKP was unnecessary, since it only affected players, who wanted to use this exploit.

If I missed any effect, please let me know.

The Unofficial Skyrim Patch, which I recommend everyone to install, can be found here: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19]Unofficial Skyrim Patch[/url]

Note: This mod must come after the Unofficial Skyrim Patch in the load order.
author: Belthazor82
